name: AutoGraphics
overview: Auto-Graphics is leading provider of technology solutions and services designed to help businesses and organizations manage, search and share their physical and digital collections of content, books and digital content to a new class of consumers equipped with tablets, e readers and entertainment devices. A-G provides and deploys the end to end web based infrastructure including the database, content, search and indexing management solutions to customers across multiple industries including public, academic, school, special and consortia libraries, as well as finance, publishing, aerospace and manufacturing companies. A-G’s modular product suite in deployable in both an On-Premise offerings as well as a standards-compliant, web-based Cloud technology architecture using open standards and HTML5/ CSS3 supported browsers and devices.
